video.title: Scream
video.synopsis: Memories of a town's dark past are stirred when a group of teens become suspects, targets and victims of a killer whoâ€™s out for blood.

episodes.synopsis: In the small town of Lakewood, the murder of a high school student stirs memories of a similar slaying that took place 20 years earlier.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Another death raises questions and causes a further rift between Emma and Audrey. A provocative podcaster arrives in town to report on the murders.
episodes.title: Hello, Emma

episodes.synopsis: Just as the killer challenges her to a dangerous game, Emma learns that her mother has been keeping more secrets.
episodes.title: Wanna Play a Game?

episodes.synopsis: Emma receives a mysterious message, leading her, Noah and Audrey to go in search of answers. Brooke feels guilty for leaving her best friend behind.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: After a scandalous video leaks, Emma discovers a heartbreaking secret. Sheriff Hudson is replaced by a state police investigator.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: When an official investigation of Rachel's death is finally launched, Emma learns that the new prime suspect is someone close to her.
episodes.title: Betrayed

episodes.synopsis: Emma races against the clock to save a friend from the Lakewood murderer's dangerous game of hide-and-seek.
episodes.title: In the Trenches

episodes.synopsis: Emma reels from another death in Lakewood but uncovers a new secret from the past.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Doubting that the real killer has been caught, Emma teams up with Piper to find answers at the big Halloween dance.
episodes.title: The Dance

episodes.synopsis: As she races to save the life of another loved one, Emma finally discovers the killer's true identity.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Emma returns to Lakewood hoping to move on, while a mysterious provocateur threatens to expose Audreyâ€™s secret and one of our own meets a grizzly end.
episodes.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

episodes.synopsis: Emma makes progress in facing her fears, until a figure from her past unexpectedly arrives in town. Noah pursues an unsettling lead for his podcast.
episodes.title: Psycho

episodes.synopsis: Emmaâ€™s relationship with her father grows more complicated while Audreyâ€™s stalker raises the stakes with a bloody gift.
episodes.title: Vacancy

episodes.synopsis: Brookeâ€™s worry over a friendâ€™s disappearance ends when a surprise party takes the Lakewood Six on an unexpected trip deep into their subconscious.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday to Me

episodes.synopsis: Another murder puts GW High into lockdown, and suspicions rise as Emma and her friends fear that their nightmares are coming true all over again.
episodes.title: Dawn of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Brooke takes action on unfinished business, Emma and Kieran struggle with trust issues, and Noahâ€™s investigation lands him and Audrey in peril.
episodes.title: Jeepers Creepers

episodes.synopsis: Eli takes Emma on a heated criminal adventure, Noah and Zoeâ€™s relationship intensifies, and the killer lures Brooke and Audrey into a deadly trap.
episodes.title: Let The Right One In

episodes.synopsis: The killer uses Lakewood's annual carnival to run Emma through a not-so-fun fun house, while Brooke lashes out at the entire town.
episodes.title: Village of the Damned

episodes.synopsis: Despite their feud, Emma and Audrey discover why the Killer is targeting them, and a long-missing body of evidence is finally found.
episodes.title: The Orphanage

episodes.synopsis: The killer further divides Audrey and Emma and uses Noahâ€™s affection for Zoe against him. Maggie and Acosta worry about secrets in their past.
episodes.title: The Vanishing

episodes.synopsis: Noah has doubts about continuing his Morgue podcast. Emma and Audrey become prime suspects when evidence implicates them in the killing spree.
episodes.title: Heavenly Creatures

episodes.synopsis: On the run and branded as Lakewood's most wanted, Emma and Audrey face off against the killer and unmask Piper's final surprise.
episodes.title: When a Stranger Calls

episodes.synopsis: The Lakewood survivors take refuge on a remote island with an infamous past and end up in a bloody standoff. Is it an old legend coming back to life?
episodes.title: Finale: Halloween / Halloween II

episodes.synopsis: Years after a traumatic incident, high school football star Deion is haunted by a figure from his past, putting him and his group of friends in danger.
episodes.title: The Deadfast Club

episodes.synopsis: Paranoid about becoming the next victims, the group begins receiving ominous messages then strategizes a trap -- but the anonymous killer strikes again.
episodes.title: Devilâ€™s Night

episodes.synopsis: With Halloween marking a significant death anniversary, the killer issues an invitation to Deion while the group sees it as an opportunity.
episodes.title: The Man Behind the Mask

episodes.synopsis: Members of the Deadfast Club begin to question each other's motives as the masked murderer makes a grave request in the next round of his deadly game.
episodes.title: Ports in the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Kym and Beth tag team on an investigation into a potential suspect. As Deion searches for Mr. Fade, he becomes wary of his older brother.
episodes.title: Blindspots

episodes.synopsis: With Jay in danger, the killer's identity continues to evade the group -- until deep, dark secrets come to light. Who will be the final ones standing?
episodes.title: Endgame
